Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: pfSense WiFi Manager - Phase 1 complete

Implemented mobile-first web application for managing pfSense router
clients with block/unblock functionality.

Features:
- Backend API with pfSense API v2 integration
- Vue.js frontend with responsive mobile-first design
- Dashboard with network statistics
- Connected clients page with block/unblock toggles
- Blocked clients management page
- Simple password authentication
- Docker Compose deployment setup
- Auto-refresh functionality
- Comprehensive documentation

Tech Stack:
- Backend: Node.js + Express
- Frontend: Vue.js 3 + Vite + Pinia
- Deployment: Docker + Docker Compose + Nginx
